v8:item.v8:content: In item forms of catalogs and documents
Users that can see the command
To see and modify options, set Publication to Enable and save the additional report.
Decoration safe mode with permissions icon
Additional report or data processor is executed with %1 security profile, which allows only the following operations:
Additional report or data processor is executed in the unsafe mode because additional report or data processor execution requires the following operations with external resources to be performed:
Additional report or data processor is executed in the safe mode with extra permissions:

To prevent accessing external resources from the additional report or data processor script for the above operations only, <link int:sp-on>enable security profiles</><link int:sp-on>. This will create a "personal" security profile for the additional report or data processor, which will contain permissions to use explicitly approved operations. Execution of the additional report or data processor will not require the save mode any longer.
For more information about additional report and data processor execution modes, see the form help.
Additional report or data processor is executed in the unsafe mode! For more information about additional report and data processor execution modes, see the form help.
Additional report or data processor is executed in the safe mode. For more information about additional report and data processor execution modes, see the form help.
Show the "Import from file" dialog when opening
Import the data processor (report) from a file
Export the data processor (report) to a file
Save the object and close the form
